content: keep track of your keys with this lovely keyhanger 1 it s crocheted in soft rainbow cotton 8/4 2 in a nice and simplistic patten find your favourite color and make your own keyhanger enjoy **materials ** − rainbow cotton 8/4 − crochet hook b/c 2 5mm − carabiner hook ¼ x 1 ½ **size ** approx 16 long **yarn requirements ** approx 10g **abbreviations ** **chain** chain **st** stitch **single_crochet** single_crochet **half_double_crochet** half_double_crochet **slip_stitch** slip_stitch 1 https //hobbii com/lanyard-keyhanger-8-4 utm_medium=social&utm_source=ravelry&utm_campaign=pattern&utm_content=lanyard-keyhanger&utm_term=swr 2 https //hobbii com/rainbow-cotton-8-4 utm_medium=social&utm_source=ravelry&utm_campaign=product&utm_content=rainbow84&utm_term=swr
